mapper.insert: insert into NOMATCH (NOMATCHID, CLASSID, DATASOURCEID, NOMATCHNAME) values (#{nomatchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datasourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nomatchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select NOMATCHID, CLASSID, DATASOURCEID, NOMATCHNAME from NOMATCH
select a.CLASSID as "classId",a.CLASSNAME as "className",count(b.CLASSID) as "count" from CLASSIFY a left join DATASOURCE b on a.CLASSID=b.CLASSID GROUP BY a.CLASSID,a.CLASSNAME
